documents.passage: The Communiverse Council oversees interstellar diplomacy. It meets in the main embassy hall with representatives from many worlds, including Hylurg and Gom. Signals from Earth are routed here before dispatch.
Glordon, the son of Lord Grigon, looks like a potato but is gentle and curious. He dislikes conflict and often accompanies Elio in the corridors of the embassy.
A keycard unlocks secure doors in the Communiverse embassy. Without it, the control room stays sealed, and alarms trigger when doors are forced.
Travel between planets uses wormholes. Pilots must align signals with the gate; failure to synchronize causes severe turbulence and delays.
